amendment.description: To make available $2,000,000 from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Army for the Para foil Joint Precision Air Drop System.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4760 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4760 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Lott. (consideration: CR S8590-8591) To make available $2,000,000 from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Army for the Para foil Joint Precision Air Drop System.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4760 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4760 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Lott.
